name: Greater Despair
summary: You increase the frequency of Mummy's Despair to once per 10 minutes instead of once per hour.
description:
You increase the frequency of Mummy's Despair to once per 10 minutes instead of once per hour. A creature that critically fails its Will saving throw is paralyzed for 1 round instead of frightened 2. Mummy's Despair gains the incapacitation trait.Traits

Archetype: This feat belongs to an archetype.
